\newcommand{\ottusedrule}[1]{\[#1\]}
\newcommand{\ottpremise}[1]{ #1 \\}
\newenvironment{ottdefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]}{}
\newenvironment{ottfundefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]\begin{displaymath}\begin{array}{l}}{\end{array}\end{displaymath}}
\newcommand{\ottfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}
\newcommand{\ottnt}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\ottcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\ottcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\ottcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottlongprodline}[2]{& & $#1$ & \multicolumn{4}{l}{$#2$}}
\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottprodnewline}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\ottafterlastrule}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{
 $ \ottmv{vars} ,\, \ottmv{n} ,\, \ottmv{a} ,\, \ottmv{x} ,\, \ottmv{y} ,\, \ottmv{z} ,\, \ottmv{w} ,\, \ottmv{m} ,\, \ottmv{o} $ &  \\
 $ \ottmv{ivar} ,\, \ottmv{i} ,\, \ottmv{k} ,\, \ottmv{j} ,\, \ottmv{l} $ &  \\
 $ \ottmv{const} ,\, \ottmv{b} $ &  \\
}}

\newcommand{\ottA}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}  ,\ \ottnt{C}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{B} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{UnitS} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \triangleright  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{F} \ottnt{X} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottX}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{X}  ,\ \ottnt{Y}  ,\ \ottnt{Z}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{B} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{UnitT} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{X}  \multimap  \ottnt{Y}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{G} \ottnt{A} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottT}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{T}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{X}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottp}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{p}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \star }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{trivT} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{trivS} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{p}  \otimes  \ottnt{p'}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{p}  \triangleright  \ottnt{p'}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{F}\, \ottnt{p} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{G}\, \ottnt{p} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\otts}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{s}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{b}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{trivS} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{T} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottnt{p} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{T} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottnt{p} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \triangleright  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda_l  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{s} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda_r  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{s} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{derelict}\, \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{ex}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{with}\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{F} \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottt}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{t}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{b}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{trivT} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{X} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottnt{p} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \otimes  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{X} . \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{app}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{ex}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{with}\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{G} \ottnt{s} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottI}{
\ottrulehead{\Phi  ,\ \Psi}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \cdot }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Phi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \Phi  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottG}{
\ottrulehead{\Gamma  ,\ \Delta}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \cdot }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Phi}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\ottA\ottinterrule
\ottX\ottinterrule
\ottT\ottinterrule
\ottp\ottinterrule
\otts\ottinterrule
\ottt\ottinterrule
\ottI\ottinterrule
\ottG\ottafterlastrule
}}

%% defn tty
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXidName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_id}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXid}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}}{%
{\ottdruleTXXidName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXunitIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_unitI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXunitI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \cdot   \vdash_\mathcal{C}   \mathsf{trivT}   \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{UnitT} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXunitIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXunitEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_unitE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXunitE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{UnitT}   \quad  \Psi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y} }%
}{
\Phi  \ottsym{,}  \Psi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :   \mathsf{UnitT}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{trivT}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}}{%
{\ottdruleTXXunitEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXtenIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_tenI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXtenI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \quad  \Psi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y} }%
}{
\Phi  \ottsym{,}  \Psi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \otimes  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y}}{%
{\ottdruleTXXtenIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXtenEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_tenE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXtenE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y}  \quad  \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Z} }%
}{
\Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Phi  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{C}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottmv{x}  \otimes  \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Z}}{%
{\ottdruleTXXtenEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXimpIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_impI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXimpI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Phi  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}}%
}{
\Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}   \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{X} . \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \multimap  \ottnt{Y}}{%
{\ottdruleTXXimpIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXimpEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_impE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXimpE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \multimap  \ottnt{Y}  \quad  \Psi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X} }%
}{
\Phi  \ottsym{,}  \Psi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}   \mathsf{app}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}}{%
{\ottdruleTXXimpEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXGIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_GI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXGI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}   \mathsf{G} \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{G} \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXGIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXbetaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_beta}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Phi  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Z}}%
}{
\Phi  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{w}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}   \mathsf{ex}\, \ottmv{w} , \ottmv{z} \,\mathsf{with}\, \ottmv{x} , \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Z}}{%
{\ottdruleTXXbetaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXcutName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_cut}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXcut}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \quad  \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y} }%
}{
\Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Phi  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}}{%
{\ottdruleTXXcutName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntty}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXid{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXunitI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXunitE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXtenI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXtenE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXimpI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXimpE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXGI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXbeta{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXcut{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

}{
\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXidName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXunitIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_unitI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXunitI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \cdot   \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \mathsf{trivS}   \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{UnitS} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXunitIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXunitEOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_unitE1}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXunitEOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{UnitT}   \quad  \Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Phi  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{UnitT}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{trivT}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXunitEOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXunitETwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_unitE2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXunitETwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{UnitS}   \quad  \Delta  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :   \mathsf{UnitS}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{trivS}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXunitETwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXtenIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_tenI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXtenI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \quad  \Delta  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \triangleright  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \triangleright  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXtenIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXtenEOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_tenE1}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXtenEOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y}  \quad  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Phi  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottmv{x}  \otimes  \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXtenEOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXtenETwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_tenE2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXtenETwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \triangleright  \ottnt{B}  \quad  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{C} }%
}{
\Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \triangleright  \ottnt{B} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottmv{x}  \triangleright  \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{C}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXtenETwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimprIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_imprI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimprI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \lambda_r  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXimprIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimprEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_imprE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimprE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{B}  \quad  \Delta  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXimprEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimplIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_implI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimplI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \lambda_l  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXimplIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimplEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_implE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimplE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{A}  \quad  \Delta  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXimplEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXFIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_FI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXFI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}}%
}{
\Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \mathsf{F} \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{F} \ottnt{X} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXFIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXFEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_FE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXFE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{F} \ottnt{X}   \quad  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :   \mathsf{F} \ottnt{X}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{F}\, \ottmv{x}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXFEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXGEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_GE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXGE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{G} \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \mathsf{derelict}\, \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXGEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXbetaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_beta}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{w}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash_\mathcal{L}   \mathsf{ex}\, \ottmv{w} , \ottmv{z} \,\mathsf{with}\, \ottmv{x} , \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXbetaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXcutOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_cut1}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXcutOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Phi  \vdash_\mathcal{C}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \quad  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Phi  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXcutOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXcutTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_cut2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXcutTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \quad  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
\Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdruleSXXcutTwoName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnsty}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash_\mathcal{L}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXid{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXunitI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXunitEOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXunitETwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXtenI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXtenEOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXtenETwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXimprI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXimprE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXimplI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXimplE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXFI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXFE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXGE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXbeta{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXcutOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXcutTwo{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJtype}{
\ottdefntty{}\ottdefnsty{}}

% defns Reduction
%% defn tred
\newcommand{\ottdruleTredXXletUName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Tred\_letU}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTredXXletU}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\,  \mathsf{trivT}   :   \mathsf{UnitT}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{trivT}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t}   \leadsto  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdruleTredXXletUName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTredXXletTName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Tred\_letT}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTredXXletT}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \otimes  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottmv{x}  \otimes  \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \leadsto  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{%
{\ottdruleTredXXletTName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTredXXlamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Tred\_lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTredXXlam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{app}\, \ottsym{(}   \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{X} . \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \leadsto  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdruleTredXXlamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTredXXappOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Tred\_app1}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTredXXappOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \leadsto  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
 \mathsf{app}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \leadsto   \mathsf{app}\, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleTredXXappOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTredXXappTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Tred\_app2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTredXXappTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \leadsto  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
 \mathsf{app}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \leadsto   \mathsf{app}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleTredXXappTwoName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \leadsto  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTredXXletU{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTredXXletT{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTredXXlam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTredXXappOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTredXXappTwo{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn sred
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXletUOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sred\_letU1}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXletUOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\,  \mathsf{trivS}   :   \mathsf{UnitS}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{trivS}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \leadsto  \ottnt{s}}{%
{\ottdruleSredXXletUOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXletUTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sred\_letU2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXletUTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\,  \mathsf{trivT}   :   \mathsf{UnitT}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{trivT}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \leadsto  \ottnt{s}}{%
{\ottdruleSredXXletUTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXletTOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sred\_letT1}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXletTOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \otimes  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottmv{x}  \triangleright  \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \leadsto  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{%
{\ottdruleSredXXletTOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXletTTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sred\_letT2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXletTTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \triangleright  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \triangleright  \ottnt{B} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottmv{x}  \triangleright  \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \leadsto  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{%
{\ottdruleSredXXletTTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXletFName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sred\_letF}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXletF}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{let}\,  \mathsf{F} \ottmv{x}   :   \mathsf{F} \ottnt{X}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{F}\, \ottmv{y}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \leadsto  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s}}{%
{\ottdruleSredXXletFName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXlamLName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sred\_lamL}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXlamL}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottsym{(}   \lambda_l  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \leadsto  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdruleSredXXlamLName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXlamRName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sred\_lamR}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXlamR}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottsym{(}   \lambda_r  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \leadsto  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdruleSredXXlamRName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXapplOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sred\_appl1}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXapplOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \leadsto  \ottnt{s'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
 \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \leadsto   \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottnt{s'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleSredXXapplOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXapplTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sred\_appl2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXapplTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \leadsto  \ottnt{s'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
 \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \leadsto   \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s'_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleSredXXapplTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXapprOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sred\_appr1}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXapprOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \leadsto  \ottnt{s'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
 \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \leadsto   \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottnt{s'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleSredXXapprOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXapprTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sred\_appr2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXapprTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \leadsto  \ottnt{s'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
 \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \leadsto   \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s'_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleSredXXapprTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXderelictName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sred\_derelict}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSredXXderelict}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{derelict}\,  \mathsf{G} \ottnt{s}    \leadsto  \ottnt{s}}{%
{\ottdruleSredXXderelictName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnsred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \leadsto  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSredXXletUOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSredXXletUTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSredXXletTOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSredXXletTTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSredXXletF{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSredXXlamL{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSredXXlamR{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSredXXapplOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSredXXapplTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSredXXapprOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSredXXapprTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSredXXderelict{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsReduction}{
\ottdefntred{}\ottdefnsred{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsJtype
\ottdefnsReduction
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
